scripts.electron: npm run electron-compile && wait-on tcp:4200 && electron ./electron-js/electron.dev
scripts.package:win: npm run build && cross-var electron-packager dist/angulectron/browser $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version --out=packages --platform=win32 --arch=all --overwrite
scripts.package:linux: npm run build && cross-var electron-packager dist/angulectron/browser $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version --out=packages --platform=linux --arch=all --overwrite
scripts.package:osx: npm run build && cross-var electron-packager dist/angulectron/browser $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version --out=packages --platform=darwin --arch=all --overwrite
scripts.package:all: npm run build && cross-var electron-packager dist/angulectron/browser $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version --out=packages --all --arch=all --overwrite
